column4: Hi! I have a problem installing intrepid... I'd like to use my hd free space to install but partition manager shows me 100% ubuntu on "after" disk preview... (I have w$ on first partition and 40G of free space after)
don't choose "Guided, use entire disk" and choose "Guided, use free space"
That's what I choosed but disk preview shows 100% ubuntu...
you could just choose manual partitioning and do it yourself
